title: Bloomberg Markets: Smead on Investing in Home Builders
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Smead on Investing in Home Builders
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: William W Smead CEO/Chief Investment Officer Smead Capital Management Discussing the markets and investing in home builder stocks, including Lennar Corp.
